name: Divine
description:
The seer resides in the game and observes the actions of each player. But very quickly, the way they finish the levels will bore him severely. He knows in advance which path and which actions will be executed at each level.

That's when the player ( played by us ) makes his entrance. The weary soothsayer then decides to change the rules, and challenges him to surprise him!

The objective of each level is not to realize the predictions that the soothsayer will make. Other solutions will have to be found to finish the game and impress him.
